amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title IV of the bill which provides for judicial review of agency compliance with specified requirements of the bill including CutGo procedures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 5 printed in Part B of House Report 114-388 to strike title IV of the bill relating to Judicial Review.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Cummings.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cummings amendment (A005) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
